sense.name: (Cause to) be a mystery or bewildering to, possibly resulting in a hinderence to some form of progress.
sense.examples: The question really baffles me. You must baffle your opponent at every turn. We're totally baffled by these problems and don't know how to proceed.

sense.name: Stop or hinder the emission of sound.
sense.examples: It was impossible to baffle the sound. Baffle your sister - I can't hear myself think! We should baffle the engine.
